creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: two calligraphy panels at beginning; landscape with two figures seated in front of the window in a small hut surrounded by small fence; small path and grove of trees at R; mountains at L; inscription at top
inscription: sheet 1: 一〇〇〇 {?}; sheet 2: 昭和四年十月念七日私の〇〇〇〇; sheet 3: 〇〇壬申秋十月〇〇〇〇; sheet 4:
markings: sheet 1: URC red seal: 師在我 {shi zai ga}; LLC red seals: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #3], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #4]; sheet 2: 福田世耕 {Fukuda Seikō} [Fukuda Seikō #1], 静處 {seisho} [seisho #1]; sheet 3: LRC red seal: 如南山之壽 {Jonanzan no kotobuki}, ULC: undeciphered; sheet 4:
signed: sheet 1: [undeciphered]; sheet 2: 古道人 {Kodōjin}; sheet 3: 〇雲〇 {?}; sheet 4: 古道人 {Kodōjin}
title: Memoires of the Osmund Mountain House
